Release Notes
Version 1.0.0\n - Public beta
Version 1.0.1\n - Public release
Version 1.0.2\n - Filtering of invalid Skirmish Upgrades in card chooser screen\n - Added form cards and companion cards in card viewer screen\n - New images for errata cards\n - Fixed Victories/Defeats dialog
Version 1.0.3\n - Added content for IACP Season 3\n - Added version availability check\n - Side effects of card removal are now reverted clicking on "undo"\n - Fixed minor bugs
Version 1.0.4\n - Fixed bugs related to Imperial Temporary Alliance\n - Fixed bugs related to Yoda, Jedi Master
Version 1.0.5\n - Fixed filtering of command cards for Force Users
Version 1.0.6\n - Fixed Command Card filtering when the army contains 4-LOM\n - Added Relese Notes dialog shown after version upgrade
Version 1.0.7\n - Added file dump for uncaught exceptions\n - Fixed crash loading an IACP army with "Cohesive Fireteam"
Version 1.0.8\n - Fixed bug in card chooser screen that sometimes ignored clicks on cards\n - Fixed bug with Imperial Retrofitting not showing up after adding SC2-M Repulsor Tank or AT-ST to the army\n - Replaced IACP Season 1 and Season 2 approved cards with their newer and more readable version
Version 1.0.9\n - Added ability to load an army from a Vassal deck file\n - Added ability to share a Vassal deck file\n - Fixed IACP elite cards not marked as elite\n - Minor changes
Version 1.0.10\n - Update for IACP v3.1
Version 1.0.11\n - Long click on a card in card chooser screen now marks the card as shortlisted\n - Shortlisted cards are always visible and listed before all the others\n - Added menu item for sharing a deck as an image\n - Minor fixes
Version 1.0.12\n - Fixed issues loading an army saved with a very old version of the app\n - Fixed issue that prevented the main screen to update army name and description after changes
Version 1.0.13\n - Fixed issues when Driven by Hatred was added to the army\n - Fixed crashes at startup when loading armies
Version 1.0.14\n - Fixed crashes with companion and form cards in card viewer
Version 1.0.15\n - Removed dialog asking for name when a new army is imported from link or loaded from file
Version 1.0.16\n - Update for IACP v3.2
Version 1.0.17\n - Fixed deployment cost of Yoda (IACP v3.2)
Version 1.0.18\n - Fixed cost of Findsman Meditation (IACP v3.2)\n - Fixed TabletopAdmiral mapping for Iron Will (IACP v3.2)
Version 1.0.19\n - Command cards for Spy trait are not filtered out when Cross-Training is added to the army
Version 1.0.20\n - Fixed issues exporting Chopper to Vassal\n - Added missing updates for IACP v3.2 cards exported to Vassal
Version 1.0.21\n - Fixed Cavalry Charge not showing up in card browser\n - Adding a group with companion now enables command cards for that companion\n - Fixed crash at startup if an army had Cohesive Fireteam card
Version 1.0.22\n - Added IACP Season 4 spoilers: Loku Kanoloa, Lando Calrissian, General Sorin, E-Web Engineer, Overwatch, Bossk, Trandoshan Hunter, The Mandalorian, IG-11, Whistling Birds and Guild Programming
Version 1.0.23\n - Added IACP Season 4 spoilers: Clan of Two and The Child
Version 1.0.24\n - Fixed evaluation of traits and restrictions for Temporary Alliance, Saska Teft and Elite Jawa\n - Handling of Squad Upgrade trait/keyword\n - Added IACP Season 4 spoilers: Shoretrooper and Mortar Trooper
Version 1.0.25\n - Added ability to filter deployment cards by traits\n - Added ability to filter command cards by restrictions
Version 1.0.26\n - Added IACP Season 4 spoilers: Loku Kanoloa, Jyn Erso, AT-RT, Elite Rebel Saboteur, General Sorin, Director Krennic, The Darksaber, Build on Hope, Deploy the Garrison!
Version 1.0.27\n - Share image menu option now shares images with a meaningful file name\n - Updated all IACP cards for old seasons with their IACP Approved image version\n - Imperial command cards are now shown if Maul and The Darksaber are both into the deployment deck\n - Added IACP Season 4 spoilers: Agent Blaise, ISB Infiltrator, Rebel Pathfinder, Verena Talos
Version 1.0.28\n - Fixed Elite Royal Guard and Knowledge and Defense to match their IACP Season 4 version\n - Updated IACP Season 4 spoilers to their fixed version: Built on Hope, Elite Rebel Pathfinder, Elite Mortar Trooper, Director Krennic
Version 1.0.29\n - Fixed Elite Rebel Saboteur in IACP lists appearing both in their FFG and IACP version
Version 1.0.30\n - Fixed share and import of Tabletop Admiral links containing IACP Season 4 cards\n - Fixed bug that prevented Yoda to be included in Mercenary armies with Temporary Alliance\n - Army description now has a more compact and descriptive format\n - Importing an army from a Tabletop Admiral link now assigns a better default name
Version 1.0.31\n - Fixed short names in army description for Chopper, Director Krennic and The Darksaber\n - Sabine now enables Brawler command cards rather than Hunter ones if The Darksaber is in the army\n - Sabine now enables both Brawler and Hunter command cards when added to an army with Maul and The Darksaber
Version 1.0.32\n - Ability to export cards from IACP Season 4 to Vassal\n - Fixed more short names
Version 1.0.33\n - Added a new menu item in army screen to clone an army\n - Added a dropdown to sort cards by name or cost in card chooser screen
Version 1.0.34\n - Shortlisted cards already added to the army are not shown anymore in the chooser screen\n - Fixed margins of ordering/filtering dropdown menus in chooser screen a
Version 1.0.35\n - Fixed a bug exporting Iron Will and Parry as a Vassal save file
Version 2.0.0\n - Data model and related resources are now separated from the app\n - IA Builder is now open-source on GitHub\n - Minor fixes to QR Code screen\n - Update for IACP v4.1
Version 2.1.0\n - Added "Browse cards" menu option in main screen\n - Card browser functionality can be used to search and display cards by applying a wide range of filters
Version 2.2.0\n - Changes for IACP v4.2\n - Improved UI for card browser and card chooser
Version 2.3.0\n - Changes for IACP v5.0 spoilers: Cassian Andor, K-2S0, Blend In\n - Added clear button for search box in card browser
Version 2.3.1\n - Fixed bug importing Vassal files with card fixes\n - If there are not enough points to add a card, an attempt to add the card together with its fix (if any) is done automatically
Version 2.3.2\n - Fixed bugs sharing files for Vassal v3.4.11 with IA Skirmish module v12.4.4
Version 2.3.3\n - IACP Season 5 content\n - Minor fixes
Version 2.3.4\n - Updated Vassal and TabletopAdmiral mappings after updates for IACP v5.0\n - Hotfix for Modular ability of IACP Heavy Stormtrooper: their cost is decreased by 1. A proper fix will come only after approval.
Version 2.3.5\n - Update for IACP v5.1\n - Fixed import/export of TabletopAdmiral links.
Version 2.3.6\n - Update for IACP v5.2\n - Fixed interaction among Doctor Aphra, Elite Jawa and Temporary Alliance.
Version 2.3.7\n - Update for IACP Season 6.0\n - 4-LOM now has access to command cards for Any Ready Vehicle, Large Creature and affiliation-specific Force User\n - Fixed interaction among Doctor Aphra, Elite Jawas and Temporary Alliance\n - Quested and Modular abilities are implemented as a flat -1 of the figure cost\n - Missing support for Vassal cards in IACP Season 6 (coming soon).
Version 2.3.8\n - Fixed a bug that did not allow to add command cards in an army.
